verbose_text: Strikingly, ectopic expression of hCHD3 at E13.5 had an effect similar to ablation of CHD4 and caused a reduction of Pax6, Sox2, and Tbr2 expression in NPCs (XREF_FIG D), indicating that the composition of NuRD complexes may represent a mechanism by which Pax6, Sox2, and Tbr2 expression is developmentally regulated.
